metadata.title: CVE-2022-45693 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Jettison before v1.5.2 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via themap parameter. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial ofService (DoS) via a crafted string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45693` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.4.1-1ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.1-1ubuntu0.22.04.1').
